text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, ʙa ahdho va qarordodho ki mijoni ʙandagon va Parvardigor va Pajomʙar va cami'i mu'minonand ʙasted, vafo kuned. Halol gardonid hajvonoti cahorpo (sutur, gov, gusfand va ohu...) ro. Ƣajri onhoe ki, az in pas ʙarojaton gufta mesavad va on ciro, ki dar holi ihrom sajd mekuned, halol masumored. Ba durusti Alloh on ci mexohad, hukm mekunad
